StoredProcedureOraclev10g.name: UPDATESTUDENT
StoredProcedureOraclev10g.source: CREATE OR REPLACE PROCEDURE GRUPO10.UPDATESTUDENT(pIDPerson IN NUMBER, pFirstName IN VARCHAR2, pSurname IN VARCHAR2,&lt;br/&gt;pTitle IN VARCHAR2, pAddress IN VARCHAR2, pPhone IN NUMBER, pPostcode IN NUMBER,&lt;br/&gt;pCampusLocation IN VARCHAR2, pYear IN NUMBER) AS&lt;br/&gt;BEGIN &lt;br/&gt; UPDATE Student_table stu&lt;br/&gt; SET stu.surname = pSurname,&lt;br/&gt; stu.firstName = pFirstName,&lt;br/&gt; stu.title = pTitle,&lt;br/&gt; stu.address = pAddress,&lt;br/&gt; stu.phone = pPhone,&lt;br/&gt; stu.postcode = pPostcode,&lt;br/&gt; stu.campusLocation = pCampusLocation,&lt;br/&gt; stu.year = pYear&lt;br/&gt; WHERE stu.idPerson = pIDPerson;&lt;br/&gt;END updateStudent;
